Title: God Mode
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Patrick Harbinson, Jonathan Nolan, Sean Hennen (story editor), Erik Mountain (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Taraji P. Henson, Kevin Chapman, Michael Emerson
Plot: Reese and Finch team up with surprising allies in a race to save The Machine from Root and the mysterious international organization, Decima, who have both re-emerged with dangerous agendas.
